name: Gordon Ramsey Scrambled Eggs
summary: Ramsey's preferred way to make scrambled eggs

steps: Add the eggs and butter to a deep saucepan (do not heat the saucepan ahead of time).
Put the saucepan on the stove over medium-high heat.
Stir the eggs and butter for about 30-60 seconds.
Remove saucepan from heat, continue to stir for another 30-60 seconds.
Continue alternating between having the saucepan on and off the stove until the eggs look like they have about a minute left to cook.
At this point, season lightly with salt and pepper. Add Crème fraîche for creamier texture.
